Posts.Content: On 2/8/2008 pkmm63 wrote: I going see a surgery on 2/18/2008 to see when he going to do a biopsy on me.  And I really don't know have that will go off.     I also had a biopsy and was so scared .  Actually it was not as bad as I anticipated. My Doctor gave me a local and it numbed the area really well..I did have a little soreness afterwards but nothing that stopped me rom doing my every day needs. I was a little bruised and that took about a week to subside. As it turned out it was cancer and I am now recouperating from the surgery. I wish you all the best and know there is support out there if you need to vent.
Posts.Title: May Have Breast Cancer
